parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the region to which the instance belongs.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID. For more information about how to query the instance ID, see [ListResourceInstances](~~412129~~).

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the instance belongs. For more information about how to query the ID of a resource group, see [ListResources](~~412133~~).
